text: Countries by garlic production in 2016 This is a list of countries by garlic production in 2016, based on data from the Food and Agriculture Organization Corporate Statistical Database. Countries - Select All; Regions - World + (Total); Elements - Production Quantity; Items - Garlic; Years - 2016 The total world production for garlic in 2016 was 26,573,001 metric tonnes. China was by far the largest producer, accounting for nearly 80% of world production at 21,197,131 tonnes. == Production by country == === >100,000 tonnes === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#ececec" !
